segments.text: That's good to know . We'll watch for crazy drivers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , guys . Ready for a pick-up game of touch football ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Football ? Sounds dangerous . Maybe I'll just be a cheerleader .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: C'mon , Yi-jun . It's lots of fun . You've seen football played on TV .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uh , yeah . And I've seen guys in pads tackled . We have no pads . I don't want to be tackled .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's barely any contact in touch football . People just tag you to stop the play .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , but they better tag lightly !
segments.speaker: S1
